entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
